responses: You can set theme color when creating form
You can set form logo when creating form, the logo can be remote url or upload from you computer
You can create/update the form with our e-form portal

You can pass data model through query string, but the data model must match the form field model. e.g. query string should look like xxx?name=TaiMan, then the form must have a filed with model key name
You can use "dataToken" to auto fill in form data. Please check dataToken for detail
Click form edit button, and set "eBookingUpdate" action with "formSubmit" execution level. The actions can find on post-action tab, which in step 2 of form creation
Click form edit button, and fset "uploadPdf" action with "onApiCall" execution level. The actions can find on post-action tab, which in step 2 of form creation
